record_1_4.TBOUND_note: Surface temperature (K). Negative value uses bottom layer temperature.
record_1_4.IEMIS_options: 0=emissivity 1.0 all bands, 1=same emissivity all bands (SEMISS[0]), 2=per-band emissivity
record_1_4.SEMISS_note: Surface emissivity per band (up to 16 values). If IEMIS=1, only first value used.

record_3_1._comment: Atmospheric profile selection (only used when IATM=1)
record_3_1.IBMAX_note: 0=layers generated internally, >0=number of layer boundaries in Record 3.3B, <0=boundaries in pressure (mb)
record_3_1.IPUNCH_options: 0=no layer data output, 1=write layer data to TAPE7
record_3_1.MUNITS_options: 0=column amounts to TAPE7, 1=mixing ratios to TAPE7

record_3_2.HBOUND_note: Surface altitude (km). If IBMAX<0, in pressure (mb).
record_3_2.HTOA_note: Top of atmosphere altitude (km). If IBMAX<0, in pressure (mb).

record_3_3a._comment: Layer generation parameters (only used when IATM=1 and IBMAX=0)
record_3_3a.AVTRAT_note: Max Voigt width ratio across layer. 0=default 1.5
record_3_3a.TDIFF1_note: Max layer temp difference at ALTD1 (K). 0=default 5K
record_3_3a.TDIFF2_note: Max layer temp difference at ALTD2 (K). 0=default 8K
